cause.description:
Many kids suffer from Neurolodical disorders that no disease or cause can be pinpointed. The testing in searching for a cause of the disorder can be very costly and often requires repeated visits to foreign countries and their hospitals. Treatment upon treatment is recommended to these kids which only brings a small relief to the symptoms and not a solution to the problem.
1. Help the kids find hope
cause.mission: To bring awareness to neurological disorders that have not been diagnosed or are rare
cause.name: Pediatric Undiagnosed Neurological Disorders
